training_data.source_text: EY Mobility Pathway Dashboard: GTR approval pending for APAC assignment
training_data.target_text: イーワイ・モビリティ・パスウェイ ダッシュボード：APACアサインメントのGTR承認待ち

training_data.source_text: Welcome to EY Mobility PathFinder. Your GMS portal access for FSO compliance review is ready.
training_data.target_text: Bienvenido a EY Mobilidad PathFainder. Su acceso al portal GMS para la revisión de cumplimiento FSO está listo.

training_data.source_text: Critical Alert: Your ICT visa for EY Mobility APAC assignment expires in 15 days. Contact your GMC immediately.
training_data.target_text: 重要提醒：您的EY 移动力 APAC任务的ICT签证将在15天内到期。请立即联系您的GMC。

training_data.source_text: Your EYMP WorkStream has identified potential PE risks in your STBV assignment. Review required for BEPS compliance and PWC documentation.
training_data.target_text: Votre EYMP WorkStrim a identifié des risques PE potentiels dans votre mission STBV. Révision requise pour la conformité BEPS et la documentation PWC.

training_data.source_text: Complete your GCR onboarding on EY Mobility Pathway. Required documents: HRIS profile, TCN visa details, and FSO clearance.
training_data.target_text: EY モビリティ・パスウェイでGCRオンボーディングを完了してください。必要書類：HRISプロファイル、TCNビザの詳細、FSO承認。

training_data.source_text: Error: COLA calculation failed for your LTA package. Update your GEMS profile with current HHG shipping status and ITTP review documents.
training_data.target_text: 错误：您的LTA待遇包COLA计算失败。请使用当前HHG运输状态和ITTP审查文件更新您的GEMS个人资料。

training_data.source_text: Dear [Name], Your EY Mobility Navigator account settings require immediate attention. Update your GTR preferences and GDPR consents for EMEIA assignments.
training_data.target_text: Estimado/a [Name], La configuración de su cuenta de EY Mobilidad Navegador requiere atención inmediata. Actualice sus preferencias de GTR y consentimientos GDPR para asignaciones EMEIA.

training_data.source_text: Configure your RMC preferences in the Global Mobility Dashboard. Select preferred vendors for: Immigration Support (ISP), Tax Services (TSP), and Relocation Support (RSP).
training_data.target_text: Konfigurieren Sie Ihre RMC-Einstellungen im Global Mobilität Dashboard. Wählen Sie bevorzugte Anbieter für: Immigrationsunterstützung (ISP), Steuerdienstleistungen (TSP) und Relokation Support (RSP).

training_data.source_text: Critical: Your STA compliance status requires GMC review. Submit TRF and FBAR documentation through GEMS portal before ICT visa processing.
training_data.target_text: Krytyczne: Twój status zgodności STA wymaga przeglądu GMC. Prześlij dokumentację TRF i FBAR przez portal GEMS przed przetworzeniem wizy ICT.

training_data.source_text: Access your EY Mobility Pathway benefits calculator. Review COLA adjustments, HRA calculations, and IPRS scoring for your GCR position.
training_data.target_text: Acesse sua calculadora de benefícios EY Mobilidade Pathway. Revise os ajustes COLA, cálculos HRA e pontuação IPRS para sua posição GCR.

training_data.source_text: Your FSO assignment requires immediate BEPS reporting. Update your PE status through EY Mobility PathFinder and submit relevant TSS documentation.
training_data.target_text: Je FSO-opdracht vereist onmiddellijke BEPS-rapportage. Werk uw PE-status bij via EY Mobiliteit Pathfinder en dien de relevante TSS-documentatie in.

training_data.source_text: Schedule your GMS orientation through the EY Mobility Navigator. Required sessions: STBV protocols, ITTP compliance, and RMC coordination briefing.
training_data.target_text: GMS 오리엔테이션을 EY 모빌리티 내비게이터를 통해 예약하세요. 필수 세션: STBV 프로토콜, ITTP 컴플라이언스, RMC 조정 브리핑.

training_data.source_text: Update your LTA preferences in the Global Assignment Workbench. Include HHG requirements, IPRS preferences, and TCN visa history for GMC review.
training_data.target_text: Aggiorna le tue preferenze LTA nel Globale Assegnazione Workbench. Includi i requisiti HHG, le preferenze IPRS e la cronologia dei visti TCN per la revisione GMC.

training_data.source_text: As per your LTA (Long Term Assignment) requirements, please be advised that your comprehensive mobility package includes COLA adjustments (based on AIRINC indices), educational support for dependents (as per FSO policy guidelines), tax equalization benefits (subject to BEPS compliance), and quarterly HHG allowance, all of which must be reviewed by your designated GMC representative before the commencement of your EMEIA regional transfer.
training_data.target_text: Conformément aux exigences de votre LTA (Affectation à Long Terme), veuillez noter que votre package de mobilité complet comprend les ajustements COLA (basés sur les indices AIRINC), le soutien éducatif pour les personnes à charge (selon les directives de la politique FSO), les avantages de péréquation fiscale (sous réserve de la conformité BEPS), et l'allocation trimestrielle HHG, qui doivent tous être examinés par votre représentant GMC désigné avant le début de votre transfert régional EMEIA.

training_data.source_text: According to the latest EY Mobility PathFinder system update, your upcoming STBV (Short Term Business Visitor) status requires immediate attention due to potential PE (Permanent Establishment) risks identified in multiple jurisdictions, particularly concerning your remote work arrangements across APAC regions, which necessitates a comprehensive review of your ITTP (International Tax and Transfer Pricing) documentation, TCN visa compliance, and updated GSS (Global Support Services) registration through the GEMS (Global Employment Management System) portal.
training_data.target_text: EY モビリティ・パスファインダー システムの最新のアップデートによると、複数の管轄区域で特定された恒久的施設（PE）リスク、特にAPAC地域全体でのリモートワーク体制に関して、STBVステータスへの即時の対応が必要とされます。これには、ITTP（国際税務および移転価格）文書、TCNビザコンプライアンス、およびGEMS（グローバル雇用管理システム）ポータルを通じた更新されたGSS（グローバルサポートサービス）登録の包括的なレビューが必要です。

training_data.source_text: Following your recent enrollment in the Global Mobility Program through EY Mobility Navigator, your designated RMC (Relocation Management Company) has initiated the comprehensive onboarding process, which includes coordination with local ISP (Immigration Service Provider) for work permit processing, arrangement of pre-assignment health screenings through approved GMH (Global Medical Health) providers, scheduling of cultural orientation sessions, and establishment of your global payroll profile in accordance with GDPR requirements and host country regulations; please ensure all documentation is submitted through the secure GMS portal within the next 5 business days.
training_data.target_text: Nach Ihrer kürzlichen Anmeldung zum Global Mobilität Program über EY Mobilität Navigator hat Ihr zugewiesenes RMC (Relocation Management Company) den umfassenden Einführungs-Prozess eingeleitet, der die Koordination mit dem lokalen ISP (Immigration Service Provider) für die Bearbeitung der Arbeitserlaubnis, die Organisation von Gesundheitsuntersuchungen vor der Entsendung durch zugelassene GMH-Anbieter (Global Medical Health), die Planung von kulturellen Orientierungssitzungen und die Einrichtung Ihres globalen Gehaltsprofils gemäß GDPR-Anforderungen und den Vorschriften des Gastlandes umfasst; bitte stellen Sie sicher, dass alle Unterlagen innerhalb der nächsten 5 Werktage über das sichere GMS-Portal eingereicht werden.

training_data.source_text: The quarterly compliance review of your international assignment has identified several critical action items that require immediate attention: 1) your A1 social security certificate for the EMEIA region needs renewal, 2) the BEPS documentation for your cross-border activities must be updated to reflect recent PE exposure changes, 3) your dependent's international school allowance requires revalidation under the updated FSO policy guidelines, and 4) your split payroll arrangement needs to be reviewed in light of recent changes to host country taxation treaties; please schedule a virtual consultation with your assigned GMS coordinator to address these matters before your next payroll cycle.
training_data.target_text: La revisión trimestral de cumplimiento de su asignación internacional ha identificado varios elementos críticos que requieren atención inmediata: 1) su certificado de seguridad social A1 para la región EMEIA necesita renovación, 2) la documentación BEPS para sus actividades transfronterizas debe actualizarse para reflejar los cambios recientes en la exposición PE, 3) el subsidio de escuela internacional para sus dependientes requiere revalidación según las pautas actualizadas de la política FSO, y 4) su acuerdo de nómina dividida debe revisarse a la luz de los cambios recientes en los tratados fiscales del país anfitrión; programe una consulta virtual con su coordinador GMS asignado para abordar estos asuntos antes de su próximo ciclo de nómina.

training_data.source_text:
Welcome to EY Mobility Dashboard
Current Assignment Status: Pending GMC Review
Important Notices:
• Tax Documentation Required
• Update Immigration Status
• Complete Compliance Training
training_data.target_text:
Bienvenue sur le tableau de bord EY Mobilité
Statut d'affectation actuel : Examen GMC en attente
Avis importants :
• Documentation fiscale requise
• Mettre à jour le statut d'immigration
• Compléter la formation sur la conformité

training_data.source_text:

Work Permit Application
Tax Residency Certificate
Family Member Details
Note: All documents must be in PDF format and less than 5MB

就労許可申請書
税務居住証明書
家族情報
注：すべての書類はPDF形式で5MB未満である必要があります

training_data.target_text: 错误：您的EY 移动力 寻路者会话已过期。请重新登录以继续访问您的STBV申请状态。

training_data.source_text: Access DealManagement Hub through GlobalStream Portal. Required: MultiAuth verification and SecureTrack setup.
training_data.target_text: Accédez au Gestion des Affaires Hub via Flux Global Portail. Requis: MultiAuth vérification et SecureTrack configuration.

training_data.source_text: Update your CrossRegion Planner settings in TalentSync Dashboard. Status: pending WorldView validation.
training_data.target_text: Aktualisieren Sie Ihre CrossRegion Planner Einstellungen im TalentSync Dashbord. Status: WorldView Validierung ausstehend.

training_data.source_text: Onboard to SmartHub Workspace through GlobalConnect platform. Check AssignmentTracker and MobilitySync status.
training_data.target_text: Intégration au SmartHub Workspace via la plateforme GlobalConnect. Vérifiez le statut de AssignmentTracker et MobilitySync.

training_data.source_text: Your ProfileManager indicates pending WorkStream updates. Review CrossBorder settings via ResourceCenter.
training_data.target_text: Ihr ProfileManager zeigt ausstehende WorkStream Aktualisierungen an. Überprüfen Sie CrossBorder Einstellungen über ResourceCenter.

training_data.source_text:
Dear Associate,

Your AssignmentPathway profile in GlobalTalent Hub requires immediate attention. The WorkflowManager has identified missing documentation in your MobilityPortal submission. Please update the following:

1. Complete your RelocateSync preferences
2. Update TalentPassport details
3. Review CrossMarket assignment options

Your dedicated ResourceNavigator will assist with DocumentFlow processing. Access the ComplianceWorkbench through your PersonalDashboard for updates.

Best regards,
Global Mobility Team
training_data.target_text:
Cher/Chère associé(e),

Votre profil AssignmentPathway dans GlobalTalent Hub nécessite une attention immédiate. Le WorkflowManager a identifié des documents manquants dans votre soumission MobilityPortal. Veuillez mettre à jour les éléments suivants:

1. Complétez vos préférences RelocateSync
2. Mettez à jour les détails TalentPassport
3. Examinez les options d'affectation CrossMarket

Votre ResourceNavigator dédié vous assistera dans le traitement DocumentFlow. Accédez au ComplianceWorkbench via votre PersonalDashboard pour les mises à jour.

Cordialement,
Global Mobility Team

training_data.source_text:
Subject: Important Updates to Your TalentMobility Status

Dear Team Member,

Our ServiceTracker system has detected pending actions in your GlobalAssign profile. According to the WorkforceNavigator guidelines, your CrossRegion transfer requires validation in the following areas:

- Update your BenefitCenter preferences through the PolicyHub portal
- Complete outstanding TaskManager items in your AssignmentConsole
- Schedule a consultation with your ProfileAdvisor for MarketPlace orientation

Please access the GlobalWorkbench platform within 48 hours to maintain your mobility status.

Regards,
International Assignment Team
training_data.target_text:
Betreff: Wichtige Updates zu Ihrem TalentMobility Status

Liebes Teammitglied,

Unser ServiceTracker System hat ausstehende Aktionen in Ihrem GlobalAssign Profil erkannt. Gemäß den WorkforceNavigator Richtlinien erfordert Ihre CrossRegion Übertragung eine Validierung in folgenden Bereichen:

- Aktualisieren Sie Ihre BenefitCenter Einstellungen über das PolicyHub Portal
- Vervollständigen Sie ausstehende TaskManager Elemente in Ihrer AssignmentConsole
- Planen Sie eine Beratung mit Ihrem ProfileAdvisor für MarketPlace Orientierung

Bitte greifen Sie innerhalb von 48 Stunden auf die GlobalWorkbench Plattform zu, um Ihren Mobilitätsstatus zu erhalten.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen,
International Assignment Team

training_data.source_text:
Subject: SmartOnboard Profile Update Required

Dear Team Member,

The AssignmentHub Portal requires updates to your ProfileSync records. According to the TalentView system, please complete:

1. Verify WorkConnect access settings
2. Update GlobalTrak preferences
3. Complete TeamSpace orientation
4. Review MoveGuide settings

Your ResourcePath specialist will guide you through DocumentSync processing.

Best regards,
Global Mobility Team
training_data.target_text:
Objet: Mise à jour du profil SmartOnboard requise

Cher membre de l'équipe,

Le AssignmentHub Portal nécessite des mises à jour de vos données ProfileSync. Selon le système TalentView, veuillez compléter:

1. Vérifier les paramètres d'accès WorkConnect
2. Mettre à jour les préférences GlobalTrak
3. Compléter l'orientation TeamSpace
4. Examiner les paramètres MoveGuide

Votre spécialiste ResourcePath vous guidera à travers le traitement DocumentSync.

Cordialement,
Global Mobility Team

training_data.source_text:
Update: CrossMarket Assignment Status

Dear Associate,

Your ServiceDesk dashboard shows pending items in the MobilityTracker system:

• Complete TaskFlow verification in ProjectHub
• Update LocationGuide preferences
• Schedule BenefitSync consultation
• Review WorkerPort access settings

Access these through your PersonalSpace portal or contact your AssignmentGuide representative.

Regards,
Global Mobility Team
training_data.target_text:
Update: CrossMarket Auftragsstatus

Sehr geehrte Mitarbeiter,

Ihr ServiceDesk Dashboard zeigt ausstehende Elemente im MobilityTracker System:

• TaskFlow Verifizierung in ProjectHub vervollständigen
• LocationGuide Einstellungen aktualisieren
• BenefitSync Beratung planen
• WorkerPort Zugriffseinstellungen überprüfen

Zugriff über Ihr PersonalSpace Portal oder kontaktieren Sie Ihren AssignmentGuide Vertreter.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen,
Global Mobility Team

training_data.source_text:
Database Error: WorkflowSync Failed

Error Details:
- DataStream connection to AssignmentBase interrupted
- TaskFlow process ID: #45678
- SystemLink status: inactive

Recommended Actions:
1. Restart ProfileSync service
2. Verify WorkConnect access
3. Check ResourceFlow logs

Contact DataSupport through ServiceDesk portal if error persists.
training_data.target_text:
Datenbankfehler: WorkflowSync fehlgeschlagen

Fehlerdetails:
- DataStream Verbindung zu AssignmentBase unterbrochen
- TaskFlow Prozess-ID: #45678
- SystemLink Status: inaktiv

Empfohlene Maßnahmen:
1. ProfileSync Dienst neu starten
2. WorkConnect Zugriff überprüfen
3. ResourceFlow Protokolle prüfen

Kontaktieren Sie DataSupport über ServiceDesk Portal, wenn der Fehler weiterhin besteht.

training_data.source_text:
Application Error: ProcessFlow Timeout

Critical Alerts:
- MobilityBase connection failed
- UserSync validation error
- TaskPortal access denied

System Status:
- DatabaseLink: offline
- WorkerSpace: locked
- DataFlow: interrupted

Error Code: EYMP-DB-4590
Contact TechSupport immediately.
training_data.target_text:
Erreur d'application: ProcessFlow expiration

Alertes critiques:
- MobilityBase connexion échouée
- UserSync erreur de validation
- TaskPortal accès refusé

Statut du système:
- DatabaseLink: hors ligne
- WorkerSpace: verrouillé
- DataFlow: interrompu

Code d'erreur: EYMP-DB-4590
Contactez TechSupport immédiatement.

• WorkerHub functions
• ResourceSync updates

training_data.source_text:
Global Mobility Assignment Notice

Your upcoming LTA assignment requires completion of the following compliance procedures:

Due to recent changes in cross-border regulations, all assignments involving STBV status must undergo enhanced PE risk assessment. Please ensure your WorkStream profile reflects current ICT documentation and BEPS reporting requirements. Your GMC representative will assist with FSO clearance and GTR approvals.

Critical Requirements:
- Update tax residency declarations in all applicable jurisdictions
- Complete IPRS validation for dependent benefits
- Submit HRA calculations for COLA adjustments
- Verify RMC coordination for household goods transport

Your prompt attention to these requirements will ensure smooth transition and TCN visa processing.
training_data.target_text:
Avis d'affectation de mobilité mondiale

Votre affectation LTA à venir nécessite l'achèvement des procédures de conformité suivantes:

En raison des changements récents dans les réglementations transfrontalières, toutes les affectations impliquant le statut STBV doivent faire l'objet d'une évaluation renforcée des risques PE. Veuillez vous assurer que votre profil WorkStream reflète la documentation ICT actuelle et les exigences de déclaration BEPS. Votre représentant GMC vous assistera pour l'autorisation FSO et les approbations GTR.

Exigences critiques:
- Mettre à jour les déclarations de résidence fiscale dans toutes les juridictions applicables
- Effectuer la validation IPRS pour les prestations des personnes à charge
- Soumettre les calculs HRA pour les ajustements COLA
- Vérifier la coordination RMC pour le transport des effets personnels

Votre attention rapide à ces exigences assurera une transition en douceur et le traitement des visas TCN.

training_data.source_text:
International Assignment Policy Update

In accordance with revised mobility guidelines, please note significant changes to long-term assignment protocols:

The GlobalWork system now requires enhanced documentation for assignments exceeding 183 days. Your MobilitySync profile must reflect current tax treaties and PE thresholds. The WorkSpace platform has been updated to accommodate new BEPS requirements and FSO compliance standards.

Key Updates:
1. Extended assignments require quarterly GTR reviews
2. Updated COLA calculations based on AIRINC indices
3. Revised HRA framework for family relocations
4. Enhanced ICT processing for dependent visas

Please schedule a consultation with your assigned GMC coordinator to review these changes.
training_data.target_text:
Aktualisierung der internationalen Entsendungsrichtlinien

Gemäß den überarbeiteten Mobilitätsrichtlinien beachten Sie bitte wichtige Änderungen bei Langzeitentsendungsprotokollen:

Das GlobalWork System erfordert nun erweiterte Dokumentation für Entsendungen über 183 Tage. Ihr MobilitySync Profil muss aktuelle Steuerabkommen und PE Schwellenwerte widerspiegeln. Die WorkSpace Plattform wurde aktualisiert, um neue BEPS Anforderungen und FSO Compliance-Standards zu berücksichtigen.

Wichtige Updates:
1. Verlängerte Entsendungen erfordern vierteljährliche GTR Überprüfungen
2. Aktualisierte COLA Berechnungen basierend auf AIRINC Indices
3. Überarbeiteter HRA Rahmen für Familienumzüge
4. Erweitertes ICT Processing für Dependent Visa

Bitte vereinbaren Sie einen Beratungstermin mit Ihrem zugewiesenen GMC Koordinator, um diese Änderungen zu besprechen.

training_data.source_text:
Tax Compliance Advisory for Cross-Border Assignments

Following recent updates to international mobility regulations, your attention is required for the following critical compliance matters:

Your current assignment portfolio in the GlobalTalent system indicates potential PE exposure risks that require immediate assessment. The ResourceFlow platform has flagged discrepancies in your WorkSpace documentation, specifically relating to BEPS reporting requirements and TCN visa classifications. Your assigned MobilityManager has scheduled a mandatory review of your CrossBorder profile.

Required Actions:
1. Complete GTR verification through AssignmentPortal
2. Update IPRS submissions for dependent benefits
3. Review FSO compliance documentation
4. Verify COLA adjustments in TalentSync system

Failure to complete these requirements may impact your ICT processing status.
training_data.target_text:
Steuerlicher Compliance-Hinweis für grenzüberschreitende Entsendungen

Nach aktuellen Änderungen der internationalen Mobilitätsvorschriften ist Ihre Aufmerksamkeit für folgende kritische Compliance-Angelegenheiten erforderlich:

Ihr aktuelles Entsendungsportfolio im GlobalTalent System zeigt potenzielle PE Expositionsrisiken, die eine sofortige Bewertung erfordern. Die ResourceFlow Plattform hat Unstimmigkeiten in Ihrer WorkSpace Dokumentation markiert, insbesondere in Bezug auf BEPS Berichtspflichten und TCN Visa-Klassifizierungen. Ihr zugewiesener MobilityManager hat eine verpflichtende Überprüfung Ihres CrossBorder Profils angesetzt.

Erforderliche Maßnahmen:
1. GTR Verifizierung über AssignmentPortal durchführen
2. IPRS Einreichungen für Angehörigenleistungen aktualisieren
3. FSO Compliance-Dokumentation überprüfen
4. COLA Anpassungen im TalentSync System verifizieren

Die Nichterfüllung dieser Anforderungen kann Ihren ICT Bearbeitungsstatus beeinflussen.

training_data.source_text:
Global Mobility Benefits Review

As part of your international assignment package with duration exceeding 12 months, please review the following benefit entitlements and compliance requirements:

Your MobilitySync dashboard indicates pending updates for long-term assignment benefits. The WorkerPortal requires validation of your ResourceTracker profile, particularly regarding HRA calculations and COLA adjustments. Additionally, your GMC representative has noted outstanding documentation for dependent services covered under the FSO policy framework.

Priority Actions Required:
- Confirm IPRS eligibility through BenefitHub
- Complete RMC household goods assessment
- Update GTR documentation for tax equalization
- Verify AIRINC index applications

Please access CompliancePortal to process these updates within 5 business days.
training_data.target_text:
Révision des avantages de mobilité mondiale

Dans le cadre de votre package d'affectation internationale d'une durée supérieure à 12 mois, veuillez examiner les droits aux prestations et les exigences de conformité suivants:

Votre tableau de bord MobilitySync indique des mises à jour en attente pour les prestations d'affectation à long terme. Le WorkerPortal nécessite la validation de votre profil ResourceTracker, particulièrement concernant les calculs HRA et les ajustements COLA. De plus, votre représentant GMC a noté une documentation en suspens pour les services aux personnes à charge couverts par le cadre politique FSO.

Actions prioritaires requises:
- Confirmer l'éligibilité IPRS via BenefitHub
- Compléter l'évaluation des effets personnels RMC
- Mettre à jour la documentation GTR pour la péréquation fiscale
- Vérifier les applications d'indices AIRINC

Veuillez accéder au CompliancePortal pour traiter ces mises à jour sous 5 jours ouvrables.

training_data.source_text:
Assignment Location Change Notice

This notification concerns critical updates to your international assignment profile following recent changes to your host location designation:

The ProjectSync system has identified necessary modifications to your MobilityTrack status based on new cross-border requirements. Your WorkflowManager must validate updated documentation through the AssignmentHub, including revised STBV classifications and PE risk assessments. The ResourceConnect platform requires immediate updates to reflect changes in ICT processing requirements.

Critical Updates Required:
1. Revalidate TCN documentation status
2. Update BEPS reporting structures
3. Adjust FSO compliance parameters
4. Review GMC clearance status

Please schedule an urgent consultation with your TalentManager to process these changes.
training_data.target_text:
Avis de changement de lieu d'affectation

Cette notification concerne des mises à jour critiques de votre profil d'affectation internationale suite aux récents changements de désignation de votre lieu d'accueil:

Le système ProjectSync a identifié des modifications nécessaires à votre statut MobilityTrack basées sur les nouvelles exigences transfrontalières. Votre WorkflowManager doit valider la documentation mise à jour via l'AssignmentHub, y compris les classifications STBV révisées et les évaluations des risques PE. La plateforme ResourceConnect nécessite des mises à jour immédiates pour refléter les changements dans les exigences de traitement ICT.

Mises à jour critiques requises:
1. Revalider le statut de la documentation TCN
2. Mettre à jour les structures de reporting BEPS
3. Ajuster les paramètres de conformité FSO
4. Examiner le statut d'autorisation GMC

Veuillez programmer une consultation urgente avec votre TalentManager pour traiter ces changements.

training_data.source_text: The city is investing in public mobility solutions for a sustainable future.
training_data.target_text: La ciudad está invirtiendo en soluciones de movilidad pública para un futuro sostenible.

training_data.source_text: This new technology improves mobility for people with disabilities.
training_data.target_text: Esta nueva tecnología mejora la movilidad para personas con discapacidades.

training_data.source_text: Mobile mobility solutions are transforming how businesses operate in the digital age.
training_data.target_text: Las soluciones de movilidad móvil están transformando cómo operan las empresas en la era digital.

training_data.source_text: Government policies aimed at increasing social mobility have shown positive results.
training_data.target_text: Las políticas gubernamentales destinadas a aumentar la movilidad social han mostrado resultados positivos.

training_data.source_text: Regular stretching exercises can significantly improve joint mobility.
training_data.target_text: Los ejercicios de estiramiento regulares pueden mejorar significativamente la movilidad articular.

training_data.source_text: Autonomous robots are increasing mobility in warehouse management systems.
training_data.target_text: Los robots autónomos están aumentando la movilidad en los sistemas de gestión de almacenes.

training_data.source_text: The mobility of capital in emerging markets has increased significantly over the last decade.
training_data.target_text: La movilidad del capital en los mercados emergentes ha aumentado significativamente en la última década.

training_data.source_text: Logistics companies are focusing on improving the mobility of goods across borders.
training_data.target_text: Las empresas logísticas están centradas en mejorar la movilidad de las mercancías a través de las fronteras.

training_data.source_text: The city is implementing new mobility solutions to reduce traffic congestion and pollution.
training_data.target_text: La ciudad está implementando nuevas soluciones de movilidad para reducir la congestión del tráfico y la contaminación.

training_data.source_text: The military is enhancing its mobility capabilities to respond more swiftly to global threats.
training_data.target_text: El ejército está mejorando sus capacidades de movilidad para responder más rápidamente a las amenazas globales.
